effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.

flavorTexts.text:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage
opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the
user’s Defense stat.
